snippet.title: Ace Combat 3 Electrosphere Opening Movie HD『オープニングムービー』OP
snippet.description:
"What do you fight for...?"

Storyboards: Atsushi Takeuchi
Mechanical Designs: Atsushi Takeuchi and Kei Yoshimizu
Animation: Production I.G 

Play our Ace Combat 3 fan-translation today!
Download: https://mega.nz/folder/xFhEXbxJ#QiEpsmDElVewIZo-CFqMzA
Homepage: https://projectnemo.net/
Blog: https://useatoday.blogspot.com/
RHDN: http://www.romhacking.net/translations/2307/

My second attempt at a High-Definition version of AC3's intro.

Screenshot Comparison:
http://useatoday.blogspot.com/2016/10/ac3-op-hd-aka-psx-h4x0rz-in-teh.html

Tools used:
jPSXdec v0.99.7 rev3397
FFmpeg 3.1.5 win32 static
AviSynth 2.6 ST
UnsharpHQ(THRESHOLD=20, SHARPSTR=2, SMOOTH=0.5, SHOW=false) # sharpen
hqdn3d(ls=3.0, cs=2, lt=3.0, ct=2.25, restart=7) # denoising
nnedi3_rpow2(rfactor=4) # scaling
TIsophote(iterations=2, tStep=0.2, type=2, chroma=false) # anti-alias

#acecombat3 #intro #opening
